resources.string: Restart word suggestion upon cursor movement
Try to use Android\'s built-in User-dictionary first (recommended).
Use only AnySoftKeyboard\'s built-in User-dictionary mechanism (not recommended).
Shifted Backspace will delete the last character
Shifted Backspace will delete the last word

This is a testing build. It may contain bugs, and it may be non-backward compatible!
It may also include  DRAGONS! And they tend to eat features.
Please, report any problem you encounter at http://s.evendanan.net/ask_issues.

Thank you for testing a development build.
Simple black theme with color highlights
Half press on camera button deletes last character, full press deletes last word
A list of suggested words will be displayed above the keyboard
Click to add a new word
Clipboard is empty, there is nothing to paste.
AnySoftKeyboard is using your contacts names to provide you with a personalized word suggestion: as you type a word, we look for similar words to auto-complete and auto-correct your typing.
Align hint text at left, center, or right of key
Align hint text at top or bottom of key
Symbols key will only show main symbols keyboard
Symbols key will cycle over all symbols keyboards
Tracing started!\nMake sure you stop it at some point
Tracing initiating failed! Check logcat for details.
Double space tap will become period+space
Failed to create memory dump file due to: %s
Do not use full-screen input in landscape
Do not use full-screen input in portrait
Show soft keyboard when physical keyboard is used
Hide soft keyboard when physical keyboard is used
AnySoftKeyboard is not a regular application - it is a on-screen keyboard replacement.

Unfortunately, there is a problem with AnySoftKeyboard. Do not panic, there is something you can do to help resolve this: send us the crash report, and we\'ll do our best to solve this crash and get you back with an awesome keyboard experience!\n\nWith sincere apology, the Dev team.
Oops, AnySoftKeyboard crashed, didn\'t see that coming
Start with the last used group
Insert space after word suggestion select
Do not show popup upon key-press
Above the pressed key or above the entire keyboard
Various appearance themes for your on-screen keyboard
Keyboard layouts for use in AnySoftKeyboard
Language key will pop-up a selection dialog
Same Dark theme, but with larger keys
Dark theme, with minimal UI elements
Same Light theme, but with larger keys
Light theme, with minimal UI elements

Key press time to be considered as long-press
This is irreversible. All your typing history will be cleared.
Use the previous word to make suggestions: %s
Initial word count:\u0020%d\nAverage next word count:\u0020%d
No usage yet. Type a bit more.
Could not find Google Play Store on your device.\nUnable to search for add-ons!
AnySoftKeyboard is not fully set-up for use. Click here to set up.
We need to read your contacts to give you a better auto-complete experience.
This is a beta version. Use with caution!
Keep Quick-Text popup open until Close key is pressed
Close Quick-Text popup after pressing a key
Use the same layout for all Apps.
Automatically switch to the previous layout used in the App.
Define the pinch gesture action. Currently, %s
Corrects commonly typed mistakes, and expands abbreviations
The order in which the Quick Text groups will be shown in the popup.
Get more keyboards at Google Play Store
Get more Quick-Text add-ons at Google Play Store
Define the stretch gesture action. Currently, %s
Select horizontal alignment for hint text
Select vertical alignment for hint text
Settings app will be visible in the launcher (may require reboot)
Define whether the keyboard is split as default. Now: %s
The minimal swipe gesture distance. Currently, %s
The minimal swipe gesture speed. Currently, %s
Error: Your device does not support 3rd-party keyboards. AnySoftKeyboard can not be activated!
In this step, you\'ll need to enable AnySoftKeyboard. Please check \'AnySoftKeyboard\' in your Language&Input settings. This will allow us to run on your device.
In this step, you\'ll can approve AnySoftKeyboard access to the contacts stored on your device. If you wish to block this access, you may disable Contacts Dictionary.
This is the first step, but don\'t worry, there are only three, very simple steps.
Thank you for choosing AnySoftKeyboard.\nThis keyboard excel in its customization level. Go ahead and personalize:
Your system can use AnySoftKeyboard now, but it is not set as the active keyboard.\nBy switching, AnySoftKeyboard will be your new on-screen keyboard, along with all its features!
Do not swap space and punctuation.
Upon ASK crash, open crash report dialog
Show hints on keys, if theme supports
Shows the keyboard icon in the device status bar.
Sound effects on soft keyboard press.
Define the swipe down gesture action. Currently, %s
Define the swipe left gesture action. Currently, %s
Define the swipe left from space bar gesture action. Currently, %s
Define the two-fingers swipe left gesture action. Currently, %s
Define the swipe right gesture action. Currently, %s
Define the swipe right from space bar gesture action. Currently, %s
Define the two-fingers swipe right gesture action. Currently, %s
Define the swipe up gesture action. Currently, %s
Define the swipe up from spacebar gesture action. Currently, %s
Do not switch from symbols/numbers to alphabet when pressing space
Switch from symbols/numbers to alphabet when pressing space
How much animations should be used. Currently: %s
Automatically learn new words. Learn method: %s
Sounds effects volume is the system\'s notifications volume.
Suggest user added words (double-click a typed-suggestion to add)
Could not store your files! Is storage available?
Failed to store words due to: %s
Successfully stored your words on device storage at /Android/data/com.menny.android.anysoftkeyboard/files/
Could not read your backup files! Is storage available?
Failed to restore words due to: %s
You do not have any words in the user dictionary. You can add your first word now.
Vibration level feedback for key-press. Currently: %s
Google\'s Voice Input is not installed on your device.\nThat can be easily fixed: install it now from Google Play Store.
I can not find voice input (com.google.android.voicesearch) at Google Play Store. Sorry, voice input will not work on your device.
Volume up turns cursor left, volume down turns cursor right
Please swipe to the previous step, and follow the instructions.
Previous setup step is not complete
AnySoftKeyboard is enabled. You are only one step away from using AnySoftKeyboard on your awesome device!
AnySoftKeyboard has access to the extra permissions. This will give you additional level of personalization.
AnySoftKeyboard is your default keyboard. But, you\'ll probably want to set-up additional things, like themes or languages?
Use OS RTL handling (for SE phones)
Keys height factor in landscape mode
Keys height factor in portrait mode
